New Records: Rohit Sharma became the third cricketer to be dismissed in the 80s four times in a calendar year in ODI cricket, following George Bailey (2013) and Kumar Sangakkara (2006)
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 87 in 101 balls, a pivotal moment as India struggled to capitalize on partnerships
India scored 229 for 9 in 50 overs, with Suryakumar Yadav contributing a handy 49
Rohit Sharma's knock of 87 was his fifth 40-plus score in the World Cup 2023, including a century and an 86
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma's dismissal at 87 marked his fourth time getting out in the 80s in ODI cricket in 2023
India's total of 229 for 9 was a challenging score to defend on a tricky pitch
Others: Rohit Sharma's performance in the match was a key focus, with his ability to adapt and steer the innings highlighted
